title: Avengers: Secret Wars, Five Nights at Freddy's Movie, Gladiator 2, Last of Us 2... KinoCheck News
description:
This time in the #KinoCheckNews "Five Nights at Freddy's Movie", "Shazam 2", "Black Adam", "Gladiator 2", "The Last of Us Season 2", "Avengers: The Kang Dynasty", "Avengers: Secret Wars" etc.| Subscribe ➤ https://abo.yt/ki | 2023 Movie News Show | More News https://KinoCheck.com/news 

00:00 The Last of Us Season 2 
The final episode of the first season of "The Last of Us" has been available for streaming since the middle of the month. Shortly after the episode's release, those responsible announced some impressive figures: almost 8.1 million users are reported to have watched the finale. So the spectacular series is on everyone's lips... 
https://kinocheck.com/news/4kbjxa

02:03 Five Nights at Freddy's Movie 
The "Five Nights at Freddy's" video games are already among the horror classics. They may not be very complex, but they can provide some decent jump scares. Blumhouse certainly wants to build on the success of the low-budget games with its film adaptation. However, they are not skimping on the cast, as the latest addition to the group of actors shows... 
https://kinocheck.com/news/3rb445

03:14 Avengers: Secret Wars 
With box office takings of almost 2.8 billion US dollars, "Avengers: Endgame" is the second most successful movie of all time, beaten only by James Cameron's "Avatar" from 2009. So it's hardly surprising that many fans are already eagerly awaiting the next installment. The release date for "Avengers: The Kang Dynasty" is set for May 2, 2025, and its sequel also has a set theatrical release date of May 1, 2026 already... 
https://kinocheck.com/news/269nh2

04:59 Dwayne Johnson vs. Shazam 2 
The latest DC movie "Shazam 2: Fury of the Gods" has only been out in theaters for a few days. The interest in the sequel to "Shazam!", which was released in 2019, has been rather moderate so far, which means that the movie will not be able to match the success of its predecessor. The Wrap reports that Dwayne Johnson, along with many other reasons, is partly responsible for the movie's flop... 
https://kinocheck.com/news/otqhd8

07:13 Gladiator 2
It was quite unexpected when a sequel to the popular historical drama "Gladiator" was announced some time ago; after all, the original is almost 23 years old and was more or less concluded in terms of content. The movie with Russell Crowe in the leading role, which was nominated for seven Oscars and won five awards at the time, proved to be a success in all respects. This makes it all the more challenging to convince fans and critics of the sequel's potential...
